overview: A thirty-something woman fears that life is passing her by and that she's going to end up as the family's 'maiden aunt'. She imagines that somebody in her circle is courting her, and he's too polite to disillusion her. And then...

production_companies.name: Sindicato de Trabajadores de la Producción Cinematográfica (STPC)

title: The Long Awaited Desperate Love
